revision.description: admin@192.168.100.1 (Local Database): Updated OpenVPN server on WAN:1195 VPN - Utilizadores Externos

package.name: squid3
package.descr: High performance web proxy cache (3.4 branch). It combines Squid as a proxy server with its capabilities of acting as a HTTP / HTTPS reverse proxy.<br /> It includes an Exchange-Web-Access (OWA) Assistant, SSL filtering and antivirus integration via C-ICAP.

package.name: squidGuard
package.after_install_info: Please visit Services - SquidGuard Proxy Filter - Target Categories and set up at least one category there before enabling SquidGuard. See https://forum.pfsense.org/index.php?topic=94312.0 for details.

package.name: OpenVPN Client Export Utility
package.descr: Allows a pre-configured OpenVPN Windows Client or Mac OS X's Viscosity configuration bundle to be exported directly from pfSense.

menu.name: Squid Reverse Proxy
menu.tooltiptext: Modify the reverse proxy server settings

menu.name: SquidGuard Proxy Filter
menu.tooltiptext: Modify the proxy server's filter settings

service.name: c-icap
service.description: ICAP Inteface for Squid and ClamAV integration
